channel.title: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that
channel.description: Hello, i have some trouble with my RSPS 317, when i try to add the item "vial of water" or any type of potion with my commands or when i add those items on a shops, it crash my client and i need to refresh it and i need to remove this item on my caracthers files because i am not able to go back on my account until this item are in my inventory or when i open the shop that content that item... I don't know how to fix :confused: :confused: Sorry if my english are not that good, i try my best :) :)

item.title: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m assuming this is because you are requesting a model id higher than your models array allows.
To fix this, increase the size of your models array.

Read full topic
item.source: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that

item.title: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

Erm I really don’t have enough information to tell you whats wrong however from what you have given me…

java.lang.arrayIndexOutOfBoundsException:76808 <-- A array which is smaller then the value of 76808 is being asked to provide the nonexistent value stored in the array at position 76808
At stream.method421(stream.java:189) <— This is likely the location of that array and where you should start to figure out whats wrong stream.java on line 189

Please post this line of code ^

Read full topic

item.title: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that
item.dc:creator: @Q_W_R Q W R
item.description:
@Q_W_R wrote:

I spawn the item on my inventory i type “::item 227 1” and my server crash… Im not spawning too many at the time and after i need to delete this item on my character files or i can’t log back

Read full topic
item.source: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that

item.title: When i spawn certain item my client Crash... I don't know how to fix that
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

ItemId is too high. Spawn the potions in a lower cache. Don’t try and spawn like 700+ data.

Read full topic
